Title: Trapping the Leader
Description:
It is time to make our move. Go to the Tomb of Shadows, weaken him, and take him captive.

I will stay here in case Garrosh arrives. He must be delayed so that we can take our prize before he destroys it in his anger.

Hurry!
ObjectivesText: Weaken and capture Shan Kien at the Tomb of Shadows in Kun-Lai Summit.
PortraitGiverText: The leader of the Korune. Take him alive!
